name: Pandora's Christmas Surprise
description:
Inspired by the Myth of Pandora. A young girl named Pandora (just a coincidence) sneaks down to the living room to open her Christmas presents a night early. Unbenkownst to her one of her gifts was  THE Pandora's  box from myth which when opened unleashed the evil globloms onto her house. She must kill them all before her parents wake up so they don't find out she tried to open her presents early.

Created by

Daniel Cutajar, Benjamin Gatt, Sean Borg, Julian Gatt and Julian Gatt (Yes we have 2 of them)
